name: Spark's Fly
description:
Knoxes are cruel, planet-invading tyrants who want nothing more than to bring chaos and destruction but Spark isn't having it. Play as Spark as he sneaks (Or dashes) through the space station to get to the escape pod and leave forever...

...To live life as a Dog on earth.

Spark's Fly is a text-based adventure game where you can choose from options that have as much chance of killing you as they do helping you progress. Good luck escaping  and getting the two available endings!

[PLAY IN FULLSCREEN]
